text: One Tree Hill is an American TV drama. It aired from 2003 to 2012. It is about two half-brothers, Lucas and Nathan Scott, who live in the town of Tree Hill in North Carolina. They play on the school basketball team and have romantic relationships. == Characters == * Lucas Scott * Nathan Scott * Peyton Sawyer * Haley James Scott * Dan Scott * Brooke Davis * Brian "Whitey" Durham * Keith Scott * Karen Roe * Deb Scott * Marvin "Mouth" McFadden * Antwon "Skills" Taylor * Rachel Gatina * Jamie Scott * Millicent Huxtable * Julian Baker * Clay Evans * Quinn James * Alex Dupre * Chase Adams * Chris Keller Category:WB network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: One Tree Hill (TV show)
